title: Introducing: Simone Rubi
body:
Splitting her time between the creative processes of music making and art, California based wonder [**Simone Rubi**](https://www.facebook.com/simonerubimusic) recently graced us with **When I’m Down,** a glimpse to the hopefully sun washed forthcoming debut album, **Hearts & Sciences,** which will drop in 2014. A criminally overlooked artist in her own right, although her bands **Rubies** and **Call and Response** have gained more critical recognition, this track deserves it’s plaudits. Arty danceable folk and dream pop melodies surrounded by a ’60s flavored jazzy pop groove that will bend every cold heart, her vagrant voice is the vehicle that leads this evaporated, glorious groove back in time, a time when masterpieces were born out of spontaneity.
